recipe.ingredients: - cheddar cheese (cubed): 1 cup - strawberries (hulled and halved): 1 cup - green grapes: 1 cup - pineapple chunks: 1 cup - wooden skewers: 8
recipe.directions: 1. Prepare Ingredients: Cube the cheddar cheese and prepare the fruits by washing them and cutting them into chunks as necessary. 2. Assemble Kabobs: Pierce skewers with a piece of cheddar cheese, then follow with a strawberry half, a green grape, and a pineapple chunk. Repeat the pattern until the skewer is filled. 3. Chill: Place the prepared kabobs in the refrigerator to keep them fresh until ready to serve. 4. Serve: Enjoy as a refreshing, healthy snack or a fun party treat for kids.
recipe.nutrition: Total Carbohydrate: 22g, Dietary Fiber: 3g, Sodium: 180mg, Saturated Fat: 6g, Total Fat: 9g, Protein: 7g, Added Sugars: 0g, Total Sugars: 15g
recipe.total_calories_estimation: - Total Calories for entire recipe: Approximately 602 calories for the entire recipe. - Calories for each ingredient: Cheddar Cheese: 455 calories per 1 cup cubed Strawberries: 49 calories per 1 cup halved Green Grapes: 62 calories per 1 cup Pineapple Chunks: 82 calories per 1 cup - Serving People: 4
